meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sulfurous.
meanings.sent1: The sulfurousness of the air after the lightning storm was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The sulfurousness of the hot springs indicated the presence of sulfur.
meanings.sent3: The sulfurousness of the rotten eggs made everyone in the room gag.
meanings.sent4: The sulfurousness of his temper was like a volcano ready to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The sulfurousness of the volcanic eruption painted the sky in fiery hues.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a strong, unpleasant smell like sulfur.
meanings.sent1: The sulfurousness of the swamp filled the air with a pungent odor.
meanings.sent2: The sulfurousness of the match being struck stung my nostrils.
meanings.sent3: The sulfurousness of the skunk's spray lingered long after it left.
meanings.sent4: The sulfurousness of the chemical spill made evacuation necessary.
meanings.sent5: The sulfurousness of the sewer made walking down the street unbearable.
